attributes.action: change the law to make anybody who uses a knife on a person, be chrged automatically with attempted murder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
any person who uses a knife against another person does not know if they may kill that person or cause minor injury.
the isuue here is intent. it could cause flesh wound or fatality.
it would be a massive deterrent to this crime.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
